city: Washington, District of Columbia, United States
position: Senior Manager, Communications at Marriott International

experience.title: Senior Manager, Global Finance Communications & Program Management
experience.description: •	Soley responsible for creating, innovating, and executing all internal communications for Global Finance Team, 1,000+ employees globally, including town halls, unique engagement events, newsletters, and critical awareness messaging, boosting the knowledge, satisfaction, and productivity of the department•	Draft and deploy all internal and select external executive communications for Chief Financial Officer, including presentations, talking points, and written correspondence •	Pitch, create, implement, and manage HR programs and strategic initiatives to cultivate and recognize talent across the Global Finance organization, ranging from an educational partnership with the AICPA, the launch of the Global Finance Awards, and our department’s job rotation program•	Re-envisioned department’s brand identity, developing and launching new logos and templates to create a cohesive brand voice •	Partner across the business to manage the rollout of new global policies
experience.description_html: • Soley responsible for creating, innovating, and executing all internal communications for Global Finance Team, 1,000+ employees globally, including town halls, unique engagement events, newsletters, and critical awareness messaging, boosting the knowledge, satisfaction, and productivity of the department• Draft and deploy all internal and select external executive communications for Chief Financial Officer, including presentations, talking points, and written correspondence • Pitch, create, implement, and manage HR programs and strategic initiatives to cultivate and recognize talent across the Global Finance organization, ranging from an educational partnership with the AICPA, the launch of the Global Finance Awards, and our department’s job rotation program• Re-envisioned department’s brand identity, developing and launching new logos and templates to create a cohesive brand voice • Partner across the business to manage the rollout of new global policies
